          <title>
            <string language="en">Plastic and leather</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Plastik und Leder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plastique et cuir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plástico e couro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Plastica e cuoio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλαστικό και δέρμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plástico y cuero</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the properties of materials that make them suitable for their purposes. Plastic and leather are used in making shoes.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bunsen burner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">candle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conical flask</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lime-water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">test</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Eigenschaften der 
Materialien, die sie verwendbar zu ihren Zwecken bilden. Plastik
und Leder werden benutzt, wenn man Schuhe bildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les propriétés des 
matériaux qui les rendent appropriés à leurs buts. Le 
plastique et le cuir sont utilisés en faisant des chaussures.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as propriedades dos 
materiais que os fazem apropriados para suas finalidades. O 
plástico e o couro são usados em fazer sapatas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le proprietà dei 
materiali che li rendono adatti a loro scopi. La plastica ed il 
cuoio sono usati nel fare i pattini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τις ιδιότητες των υλικών 
που τους καθιστούν κατάλληλους για λόγους τους. Το πλαστικό 
και το δέρμα χρησιμοποιούνται στην παραγωγή των παπουτσιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las características de
los materiales que los hacen convenientes para sus propósitos. 
El plástico y el cuero se utilizan en la fabricación de los 
zapatos.</string>
          </description>
